titleStmt.title: The Churches deliuerance contayning meditations and short notes vppon the booke of Hester. In remembrance of the wonderfull deliuerance from the Gunpoulder-treason. By Thomas Cooper.
titleStmt.author: Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by G. Eld for T. Adams, and are to be sold at the white Lyon in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
